name: Stickman Dual: The Truth
description:
The sequel to Stickman Dual, one of my previous games, for Devtober 2021.
This game takes a unique twist on Stickman Dual, which started as a multiplayer game however due to numerous issues / bugs from multiplayer, I wanted to remake the game but make it a lot less buggy and give it the treatment it actually deserved.
The game starts with you, as a stickman, entering your bosses office, about to learn the truth that will change your fate throughout the game.

Controls (Keyboard and Mouse)

A D - Left/Right

Spacebar - Jump

Left Shift - Sprint

Numbers 1-5 - Switch Weapons

Left Mouse Button - Shoot/Punch

Right Mouse Button - Aim

R - Reload

Controls (PlayStation Controller)

Left Stick - Movement

Right Stick - Cursor

Cross (X) - Jump

L3 - Sprint

L1 + D-Pad - Switch Weapons

R2 - Shoot/Punch

L2 - Aim

Square - Reload

Controls (Xbox Controller)

Left Stick - Movement

Right Stick - Cursor

Cross (X) - Jump

L3 - Sprint

LB + D-Pad - Switch Weapons

RT - Shoot/Punch

LT - Aim

A - Reload
